function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased relative humidity in the chamber air","Impact":"Promotes the growth and spread of airborne contaminants and pathogens","Mitigation":"Use dehumidifiers or air conditioning to reduce relative humidity levels","Technologies":"Dehumidifiers, air conditioning systems","People":"Occupants of the built environment","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers"},{"Description":"Changes in chamber air temperature","Impact":"Changes in temperature can affect the survivability and propagation of airborne pathogens","Mitigation":"Maintain consistent temperature levels using heating or cooling systems","Technologies":"Heating systems, cooling systems","People":"Occupants of the built environment","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers"},{"Description":"Inaccurate representation of filter bed moisture levels","Impact":"Inaccurate moisture levels may lead to ineffective control of airborne contaminants and pathogens","Mitigation":"Implement multiple moisture control sensors in different locations of the filter bed","Technologies":"Moisture control sensors","People":"Facility maintenance staff","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers"}]}
